Title: Out of Town
Plot: In the third-season opener, Salvatore and Don take a business trip out of town. Pete Campbell and Ken Cosgrove worry about the changes at Sterling-Cooper and how the changes will impact them.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Joseph Culp, Bryan Batt, Ryan Cartwright, Brynn Horrocks, Michael Gaston, Sunny Mabrey, Jack Kehler, Julie McNiven, Orestes Arcuni, Kelly Huddleston, Annie Little, Joel Lambert, Jamie Elman
